metadata.title: Evaluate to true if the win-def:group_test is properly supported.
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the win-def:group_test.

notes.note: It is important to note that the values used in this test definition are specific to a particular machine, and may not necessarily apply to your system. As a result, in order to have the definition return a result of 'true', you must either change these values to the ones found on your particular system, or you must configure your system to use these values.

criterion.comment: Test that a group_sid_object is supported.
Test that a group_sid_object pattern match is supported.
Test that a group_sid_object not equals is supported.

group_sid_test.comment: Test that a group_sid_object is supported.
Test that a group_sid_object pattern match is supported.
Test that a group_sid_object not equals is supported.

group_sid_object.comment: Retrieves a group_sid_object that has a SID equal to 'S-1-5-32-544'.
Retrieves a group_sid_object that has a SID that matches the regular expression 'S-1-5-32-54[0-9]'.
Retrieves a group_sid_object that has a SID not equal to 'S-1-5-32-544'.

group_sid_state.comment: This state represents a group_sid_object that has a SID equal to 'S-1-5-32-544'.
This state represents a group_sid_object that has a SID that matches the regular expression 'S-1-5-32-54[0-9]'.
This state represents a group_sid_object that has a SID not equal to 'S-1-5-32-544'.
